tourBios.otherInfo: Will be a rookie on the 2009 Web.com Tour. His only previous career start came as an amateur at the 2003 Alberta Classic, where he missed the cut. Has never played in a PGA TOUR event. Played on the Gateway Tour in Arizona from 2006-08 and won four times. He was a member of the 2008 Canadian Tour. Won the inaugural Seaforth (Ontario) Classic by two strokes. Fired rounds of 65-64-65-64 for a 26-under total. His winning score was one shot off the Tour's all-time mark set by Tim Clark. Also T9 at the Greater Vancouver Charity Classic and was named the 2008 Rookie of the Year.

tourBios.otherVics: Won the 2010 Economical Insurance Group Seaforth Country Classic, Won the 2008 Seaforth Country Classic
tourBios.curYrHigh: T16th at the 2013 Times Colonist Island Savings Open
tourBios.otherInfo: Earned 2008 Canadian Rookie of the Year honours, Played on the Gateway Tour where he had three victories.
tourBios.prYrSeason: Made five cuts in seven starts in 2012, including top-10s at the Syncrude Boreal Open presented by AECON (T-6) and the Jamieson WFCU Windsor Roseland Charity Classic (T- 10)

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Canada in 2014 is T21st at the PC Financial Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 71st in Career Money Leaders on the PGA TOUR Canada.
